description:
Youichi has been trying to give a love letter to his middle school classmate Sayaka, but always fails.  Ringo and the girls see this and want to help make his confession a success. However, Ringo and Natsuki get into a fight over how to help him.  Natsuki dislikes Ringo`s method of trying to teach him how to be more popular with girls, using her favorite girl`s comics as an example. As hard as Leila tries to stop the fighting, Ringo and Natsuki won`t make up and things only gets worse.  Even Chris warns them that if their feelings cannot become one, they cannot become Lil` Pri and can`t save Fairy Land. Will Ringo and Natsuki be able to make up?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ぷりぷりキューピッド ☆ぷりっ!
